text: walaqad sadaqakumu l-lahu waʿdahu idh tahussunahum bi-idh'nihi hatta idha fashil'tum watanazaʿtum fi l-amri waʿasaytum min baʿdi ma arakum ma tuhibbuna minkum man yuridu l-dun'ya waminkum man yuridu l-akhirata thumma sarafakum ʿanhum liyabtaliyakum walaqad ʿafa ʿankum wal-lahu dhu fadlin ʿala l-mu'minina
